thread.title: Sir Alex Ferguson: Secrets of Success
thread.title_full: TV | Sir Alex Ferguson: Secrets of Success - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Sir Alex Ferguson: Secrets of Success
text: Former BBC Political Editor Nick Robinson interviews retired football manager Alex Ferguson, who not only led Manchester United to pick up every domestic football trophy available during the course of his 26-year premiership, but also transformed the team into a multi-million pound global business. In this candid interview, Sir Alex reveals just how he did it exactly, sharing crucial tips on motivating, disciplining and inspiring people. Also features contributions from a whole load of football greats including Cristiano Ronaldo, Rio Ferdinand, Jose Mourinho, Ryan Giggs as well as Tony Blair and Alan Sugar.
